long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically refresh and monitor web pages with specified time intervals using the Auto Refresh browser extension. This extension reloads any page or tab after a specified number of seconds. Simply enter the desired interval and click "Start."

The best part is that there's no setup required. It's easy to use and install. Just let the extension handle the auto-reloading of your idle pages. Choose your desired time interval, and the Page Refresh extension will do the rest.
